importantArticles.headline: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. (the "Company") (Nasdaq: WBD) today announced that it intends to add Anton Levy as an independent director to the Company's Board of Directors in connection with the 2025 Annual Meeting of Stockholders (the "Annual Meeting"). His addition follows a comprehensive search process led by the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee.
importantArticles.title: Warner Bros. Discovery Announces the Addition of Anton Levy to its Board of Directors
